dev.nick.imageloader.cache

类 CachePolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.nick.imageloader.cache.CachePolicy

  • public class CachePolicy
extends java.lang.Object
    Policy reading when caching images. Using CachePolicy.Builder to build a policy.
